data.title: Still the best!!!
data.text: When you have the cravings for a good hot dog, this the best. Quick and easy and a great deal. I believe there has been an ownership change and some prices have changed but still a good bargin

data.title: Can't go wrong with a Sneaky Pete's!
data.text: Don't you just sometimes crave a really good hot dog? Well, this is the place for you! Not fancy, counter service but oh, so good! Get your "dog" any way you want it: chili, kraut, onions, cheese, or even footling! How about some chips, fries, and a good cold soft drink with this?

data.title: Hot Digity Dog!
data.text:
Love this Sneaky  Pete's restaurant. It's small and always busy at lunch. For the most part customers don't linger so it isn't hard to get a booth. I like it because, even with a lot of customers, one can hear the person talk sitting across the table from them. That's not something common in fast food restaurants at the noon hour here in our city.  Always friendly, always clean and always terrific hot dogs & fries. My favorite is the chili dog with their wonderful tasting hot french fries.
My partner and I always try to eat here at least once or so every 3 to 4 weeks and will continue to do so. Hope you'll follow suit!

data.title: Still Very Good After All These Years!
data.text: I hadn't been here for about 18 years since I was in college. Stopped by and had hot dogs with the family and they were just like I remembered them. They were very good. Service was a bit slow, but workers were friendly.

data.title: Great for Lunch
data.text: Birmingham has always been know for good hot dogs diners and Sneaky Pete's is at the top of my list.  I have beengong here for years and always find it a treat.

data.title: Don't get the hype about Sneaky Pete's
data.text: Visited the Montgomery Hwy location on two occasions while having lunch with the remodeling crew working on my nearby home. The hotdogs are definitely made with something mysterious and their famous sauce is the same way. Sort of a runny, reddish stuff without much flavor. The chili isn't any better. You've got to order two hotdogs due to their small size so the prices aren't as cheap as it first appears. The fries are not as warm as they should be and my order included many short, overcooked ends. I wouldn't serve fries like that. The work crew goes there for lunch mid-week because it's cheap fuel, I guess. I gave the place two tries and won't go back. The place is clean and the wait staff is friendly.
